author: Bryan Bohannon
comment: I love the app, but the Paycheck Planner is a dumpster fire. It's an amazing idea and it worked much better when it first came out. Since then, it feels less like an app and more like a web portal where the rules are made up, none of the buttons do anything, and you're counting some of my bills twice and some of my bills never. It's not too complicated if I could do a better job of this with a single calendar sheet. And let me at least attempt to use and edit this on the real website.

author: Chris Harpner
comment: Nor updating to the 2/22/2018 version due to all the complaints. +USAA, we expect actual update notes with each release, unique to each release, but just a blanket "we're always updating..." that's what scammers do.  You're our BANK!  You have a responsibility to tell us what we're installing on our personal devices.

author: A Google User
comment: Just realized that I can no longer save confirmation of transfers committed via mobile. A "Save" button is present, but it does nothing. It's bad enough that we can't save screenshots, and now I can't export the image via the app's facilities. Is this USAA's fix to not being able to export multiple confirmations to the same directory due to having the same file name? Ugh... If it's not one thing, it's another...

author: Scott R
comment: If you like a spinning white circle around a USAA logo, this is the app for you! Otherwise it is worthless for paying bills.  How many people have to tell USAA this app is broken before you fix it? Like others are posting, it is so slow now.  I can no longer pay bills since the "pay" screen will not load.  On occasion it will load but the accounts drop down is blank...  Pretty much non functional...

reply.author: USAA
reply.content: We’re sorry you’re encountering this problem. Please email your member number to mobile@usaa.com so our team can further assist you.

comment: I used to use this app a lot, but haven't been able to get past the login screen for a while, as the circle just spins until the screen times out. I am super disappointed, and it sounds like so are a lot of other users. I wish USAA would listen and fix this app.

author: Cyndil Smith
comment: I used to be able to do all my online banking using the app. now I am unable to do much more than view my account balances, if that. often I get an error message! if ever it does work properly, it's incredibly slow.
Zelle was a good feature, but now it doesn't work. Screen just keeps buffering. How many people need to complain before it is fixed?

author: david sims
comment: I love my usaa coverage, but this app is a pain to use. Log in doesn't seem to work all the time, navigation is non intuitive. I have chosen not to further my coverage with usaa(open credit card)  solely because I do not want to be forced to interact with this app more than I have to.

author: Dominic Ottaviano
comment: Do not try and use the car buying assistance feature.  I thought it was going to give me a price and instead I now have 3 dealerships blowing up my phone because USAA gave out my personal information, bith phone number and email.

author: Jose Gomez
comment: App was working great, then I received an update and all it does now is give me a "Bad Request" error on every page I try to go to. Please fix it ASAP!! Would be 5 stars if it worked!!!

author: Brock Woodward
comment: STILL NO Change as of March 3rd!!! No change as of 26 February 2018!!! This app is woefully broken as of its latest update, Feb 7, 2018. According to USAA Tech Support the "bug fixes" w/the latest updare does not "play" well with older Android OS's.  So if you have an older phone expect this app to be broken until new bug fixes are pushed out to fix the current "bug fixes".  :-/  EDIT: v8.33.3. No change after latest update.  Still cannot access my accts on my Samsung Note 4 running OS 6.0.1. :(

author: Nedra Brantley
comment: It was working fine until the last update. Now it keeps crashing. Usaa is not listening to their customers. Bad customer service all around.

author: J. Joseph
comment: After seeing all the reviews about the app not working on the Galaxy S III and Note II, I was very reluctant to try it. To my surprise the app works well.

author: Rob H
comment: This work great until I updated it here recently. Now it won't locate me but I can use my GPS just fine so much for app deposits I guess I'll just go to the local branch oh wait

author: tim crotts
comment: Love the app but looking at vehicles, it doesn't allow me to refine my search anymore. Is a big issue when looking for a vehicle

author: A Google User
comment: I am pretty sure USAA is run by the VA these days. Can't wait to move all my accounts away from this terrible organization.

author: Nichole Slaughter
comment: Previous version of this app was flawless. Current version is horrible. Times out frequently, have to restart. Incredibly glitchy. Please fix.

author: Amy Bevard
comment: Since the last update I get Communication Error. Unable to complete your request.

author: Luke Sagarin
comment: I used to love this app, but since the last update, many of the features I use on a regular basis do not function properly. All this app is good for now is to check my balance, anything else is a crapshoot if it will work. You can do better than this USAA!

author: Nancy Beebe
comment: The app worked perfectly until the latest update.  I can no longer transfer funds using my phone.  I even updated the update, which worked for one transfer,  but it is not working again.  :(

author: Stephen Mapp
comment: Great app not perfect but works as need to get the job done! Checking, savings, auto, home and credit monitoring. Various accounts you can set up, love this app!

author: Johnathan Henley
comment: I love USAA. However, lately I have been unable to use the app as it give a failure to retrieve my location. I have my location turned on and permissions granted for the app.

author: Melissa Jones
comment: I've never been happier with a bank or an app. Thanks USAA, keep up the great work.

author: W M
comment: Very glitchy app.  Also the internet based phone calls always drop.

author: Frank Licastro
comment: Can't transfer money to my wife through the app. Delivers error code which is extremely frustrating.

author: bd001217
comment: App won't even let me pay my bill.it just keeps spinning. I uninstalled and reinstalled, same thing. I've used the app for several years,  but after latest update it no longer works for me.

author: Carol Healer
comment: Unable to access my account last 3 days, failed location,. Why

author: Felicity Ligon
comment: All will not let me transfer money anymore. Extremely frustrating.

author: A Google User
comment: Uninstalled and reinstalled, but still broken. Don't make me start putting cash in a mattress.

author: Sergio C.
comment: Junk app works when it wants to. Also locks you out of your account on occasion.

author: Susan Kirkland
comment: Easiest banking app I've ever used. Lots of features to help plan for vacations, emergency savings, etc.

author: Larry Berg
comment: You broke the app won't save confirmation now. GS8+

author: Esintial Davi
comment: Save button has stopped working after tranfers.

author: Erica Lowe
comment: Unable to send money, keep getting error page

author: Nathaniel Greve
comment: I can't get the app to do anything but show me the USAA logo with a spinning wheel around it.

author: Adam Peoples
comment: Update broke deposit by phone

author: Tanya Newvine
comment: ABSOLUTELY RECOMMEND!   Everything can be done in the palm of your hand!  Great for people on the go. RV'rs will Love it!!

author: Mj Nussbaum
comment: Mobile deposit hasn't worked for 2 weeks.  I'm ready to deposit elsewhere.

author: Brandon Costanzo
comment: It would be great if the Quick logon could be activated on the Pixel 2 XL.

author: Cathy McCann
comment: Great bank Great app.
